> Suppose I have a test class, which I wan=
t to run with two different
> Runners. How would I do so without having to =
duplicate the test 
class

I would create an interface for the runners. Then at run-time=
, 
instantiate the particular runner that you want to run the test class 
u=
nder. Actually I am currently working on something similar. 
Interfacing al=
lows you to hide your multiple runners and it makes you 
run your test clas=
s from a single point. You choose which runner to 
run your test class at r=
un time when you instantiate the runner.
